entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 07:59 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming west 20 after midnight. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 07:59 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
